remarks: Value of partial isomorphism A at lattice orthocomplement (using a Sasaki projection to get orthocomplement relative to the fiducial co-atom ` W ` ).  (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
diaoc.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
diaoc.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
diaoc.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
diaoc.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diaoc.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaoc.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaoc.n $e |- N = ( ( ocA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diaocN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. dom I ) -> ( I ` ( ( ( ._|_ ` X ) .\/ ( ._|_ ` W ) ) ./\ W ) ) = ( N ` ( I ` X ) ) ) $.
